publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2571 Michael Russell: Fèisean nan Gàidheal—That the Parliament congratulates Fèisean nan Gàidheal, the National Association of Gaelic Arts Youth Tuition Festivals, on its work in the last year in involving over 3,600 young people in Gaelic cultural events, and commends the hard work by all in the organisation in order to involve a new generation of young people in Scotland’s Gaelic heritage despite the present range of difficult circumstances which face Gaelic, not least the fact that the present shortage of Gaelic teachers results in the language relying heavily on the goodwill of volunteers, such as those in Fèisean nan Gàidheal.

S1M-2571 Michael Russell: Fèisean nan Gàidheal-That the Parliament congratulates Fèisean nan Gàidheal, the National Association of Gaelic Arts Youth Tuition Festivals, on its work in the last year in involving over 3,600 young people in Gaelic cultural events, and commends the hard work by all in the organisation in order to involve a new generation of young people in Scotland's Gaelic heritage despite the present range of difficult circumstances which face Gaelic, not least the fact that the present shortage of Gaelic teachers results in the language relying heavily on the goodwill of volunteers, such as those in Fèisean nan Gàidheal. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*, Brian Adam*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Michael Matheson*, Shona Robison*, Linda Fabiani*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Roseanna Cunningham*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Irene McGugan*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Fiona Hyslop*, Colin Campbell*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2571 Fèisean nan Gàidheal (lodged on 20 December 2001) Donald Gorrie*
